text: A friend sends you a link to a funny video. Do you:

left.consequence: The video is hilarious! But it auto-played another video with a loud ad.

right.choice: Check the link first for safety.
right.consequence: The link seems safe. You enjoy the video without any surprises!

text: You see a social media post about a free giveaway. Do you:

left.consequence: You won! ...But the prize requires you to share a lot of personal information.

right.choice: Research the company behind the giveaway first.
right.consequence: It turns out it's a scam! You saved yourself from potential trouble.

text: Your antivirus software prompts you to update. Do you:

left.consequence: You forgot all about it. Your computer is now vulnerable to the latest threats.

right.choice: Update immediately.
right.consequence: Your device is now protected against the latest threats. Good job!

text: You need to create a new password. Do you:

left.consequence: Your account got hacked! It's time for a stronger password.

right.choice: Use a strong, unique password.
right.consequence: Your account is much safer now. It might be hard to remember, though.

text: You get a text message about a suspicious charge on your credit card. Do you:

left.choice: Click the link in the text to resolve it.
left.consequence: Oops! That was a phishing scam. You just gave away your card info.

right.choice: Call your bank directly to verify.
right.consequence: It was indeed a fraudulent charge! Your quick action saved the day.
